amendment.description: Amendment states United States findings and policy relating to democracy in Iran.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 33 printed in House Report 108-206 to declare that it is the policy of the U.S. that there be a free and fully democratic government in Iran.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sherman amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Sherman.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Sherman amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
